name: Maldivian Aviation Academy
about: Maldivian Aviation Academy (MAA), established on December 28, 2021, is a premium flying academy located at Gan International Airport, Addu City, Maldives. Owned by Island Aviation Services Limited, MAA is dedicated to training the next generation of pilots. With a state-of-the-art simulator and comprehensive facilities including a theory examination center, lecture rooms, and an in-house maintenance facility, MAA offers integrated training programs such as the Integrated CPL with MEP Rating and ATPL Theory. Our transparent fee structure and cost-effective courses ensure a seamless learning experience. Backed by experienced instructors and a commitment to safety, MAA aims to become the leading aviation academy in the region, providing students with a unique and engaging learning environment amidst the serene and breathtaking views of the Maldives.
services:
["Integrated CPL with MEP Rating & ATPL Theory
Instrument Rating (IR)
Multi Engine Rating (MEP)
Flight Instructor Rating"]
